# Lecture 3: Practical CSS and the Box Model
---

Welcome to Lecture 3! Here's a brief class breakdown.

#### Learning Objectives
---

1. Understand how to write [modular, reusable](https://en.bem.info/methodology/key-concepts/) CSS code
2. Learn about the Box Model, a CSS layout paradigm

#### Rundown

#### [Build a Landing Page](#build-a-landing-page)
